name: Nuprint Technologies Ltd
goal: We are a printing business operating on the border between Northern Ireland and the Republic of Ireland.  Exporting approximately 40% of our production to the ROI we have a clear insight and interest in the progress and outcome of the EU negotiations on Brexit.
interests: Business and Industry, Education and training, Single market
euInitiatives: As a border business we are interested in the progress and outcome of Brexit negotiations with specific regard to the operation of the border with the Republic of Ireland.
